alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 12:36PM AKST until January 02 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow, sleet, and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a glaze to one tenth of an inch. East winds gusting as high as 45 mph along the upper Potter Marsh and Bear Valley areas. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light snow, sleet, and freezing rain will continue through this evening. Temperatures will hold steady in the upper 20s to lower 30s, with the exception of the upper hillside which could rise in into the mid 30s during the day Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
